A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
This movie completely surprised me. When I walked in I thought I knew what I was getting. I knew what the questions were and the only mystery was how they would be answered. About 2/3 through the movie\, the entire Star Wars universe changed for me. I didn't know what the questions were\, let alone the answers. It was amazing.

The sense of humor in this movie is much drier than previous Star Wars movies\, and that really worked for me.
Also\, this movie also wrestles with questions of legacy that is a little meta\, but very welcome.
